item.title: Statistical Rethinking
item.description: R Markdown data { int<lower=0> N; // NUMBER vector[N] height; } parameters { real mu; real<lower=0> sigma; } model { height ~ normal(mu, sigma); } This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min.
